snippet: The Tribune Company won court approval to emerge from Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection.
abstract: Tribune Company wins court approval to emerge from Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, more than four years after a leveraged buyout left it with unsustainable debt.
lead_paragraph: The Tribune Company won court approval to emerge from Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection.

headline.seo: Tribune Company to Leave Bankruptcy Protection
headline.main: End of Bankruptcy for Tribune Co.
headline.print_headline: End of Bankruptcy For Tribune Co.
